nearly.translation[0].definitions[0].def: almost, but not quite or not completely
nearly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: It took nearly two hours to get here.
Louise is nearly as tall as her mother.
I nearly always go home for lunch.
nearly.translation[0].note_box[0].items[: Don’t use nearly before negative words such as ‘no’ or ‘nothing’
I know nearly nothing about it
You can use almost with negative words such as ‘no’ or ‘nothing’
I know almost nothing about it
You can also form negative sentences using hardly with ‘any’, ‘anything’ etc
I know hardly anything about it
